messages.title: The Lib Dem difference
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats will take action to protect frontline NHS services, will put more police on patrol, restore the pensions' earnings link and deliver fair pay for the armed forces. We can make these savings because we have identified real savings to pay for it. The Lib Dems are the only party with a plan to balance the country's books after the recession.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Nick Clegg’s tax plan means that the first £10,000 you earn – cutting most tax bills by £700.
Smaller class sizes, more cash for schools.
Invest in public transport, renewable energy and energy efficient homes.
Make politicians accountable, giving you the right to sack corrupt MPs.

issues.governance: Make politicians accountable, giving you the right to sack corrupt MPs.
issues.health: OUR NHS. At risk with the Conservatives

leaflet.personalStatement: Margaret was the first member of her family to go to university and feels passionately about equal opportunities regardless of background. Margaret stood in the last General Election in protest against the Iraq War and is campaigning for a return to an honest government.

contactInformation.address: Witham Lib Dems, 54 Grymes Dyke Way, Stanway, CO3 0QT

quotes.text: OUR NHS. At risk with the Conservatives
Tory Health spokesman accepted £21,000 donation from private health firm boss
"We've lived through this mistake for 60 years now... The reality is it [the NHS] hasn't worked - it has made people iller."
quotes.source: Senior Conservative MEP Dan Hannan, Summer 2009

quotes.text: David Cameron meets NHS privatisation campaigners
Key Tory MPs backed call to dismantle NHS

images.caption: Margaret Phelps with residents, interacting and discussing issues.
